import React, { useState, Fragment, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { createProfile, getCurrentUser } from "../../actions/profile"; import { connect, useSelector } from "react-redux"; const EditProfile = ({ history, getCurrentUser, createProfile, profile }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: "", website: "", location: "", status: "", skills: "", githubusername: "", bio: "", twitter: "", facebook: "", youtube: "", linkedin: "", instagram: "" }); const [dispaySocialLink, toggleSocialLink] = useState(false); const { loading } = profile; useEffect(() => { getCurrentUser(); setFormData({ company: loading || !profile.company ? "" : profile.profile.company, website: loading || !profile.website ? "" : profile.profile.website, location: loading || !profile.location ? "" : profile.profile.location, status: loading || !profile.status ? "" : profile.profile.status, skills: loading || !profile.skills ? "" : profile.profile.skills.join(","), githubusername: loading || !profile.githubusername ? "" : profile.profile.githubusername, bio: loading || !profile.bio ? "" : profile.bio, twitter: loading || !profile.social ? "" : profile.profile.social.twitter, facebook: loading || !profile.social ? "" : profile.profile.social.facebook, youtube: loading || !profile.social ? "" : profile.profile.social.youtube, instagram: loading || !profile.social ? "" : profile.profile.social.instagram, linkedin: loading || !profile.social ? "" : profile.profile.social.linkedin }); }, [loading]); //destructuring const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, instagram, youtube } = formData; const onChange = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); createProfile(formData, history, true); }; return (

onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself

); }; EditProfile.propTypes = { profile: PropTypes.object, createProfile: PropTypes.func, getCurrentUser: PropTypes.func }; const mapStateToProps = state => ({ profile: state.profile }); export default connect( mapStateToProps, { createProfile, getCurrentUser } )(withRouter(EditProfile));
